about_the_game:
Step into a darkly whimsical tale of magic, morality, and twisted family values. You play as Lucas, a reluctant young witch trapped in a bizarre household where dinner isn’t just served—it’s hunted, prepared, and consumed with dark intent.

Will you embrace your parents' ways, find the courage to forge your own path, or fall prey to the cutthroat world of witches where it’s truly "eat or be eaten"?

Features:

This is a story-driven walk-and-talk adventure game where you’ll:

  • Dive into a dark and twisted world that feels like Harry Potter took a wrong turn into a sinister fairy tale.

  • Solve light puzzles, including deadly cooking challenges.

  • Play as Lucas, a reluctant young witch trying to escape a twisted, cannibalistic upbringing while navigating a world of dark magic, tough choices, and unexpected alliances.

  • Make choices that shape the story and its outcome.

  • Decide who lives, who dies, and who ends up on the menu.

  • Uncover multiple endings, each revealing a different side of the tale.

name: Cook or Be Cooked: Your next meal could be your last—or your true love
short_description: A walk-and-talk indie adventure game where you and your dysfunctional witch parents cook teens to stay young and powerful. But when they bring in a charming girl as your next meal, will you uphold the family tradition or risk everything to save her?
